title.rendered: Former Colorado Governor Bill Ritter Joins the Blackhorn Team

content.rendered:
[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” admin_label=”Header Image and Post Title” _builder_version=”3.18.7″ background_color=”#000000″ background_image=”https://blackhornvc.com/wp-content/uploads/Energy.jpeg” parallax=”on” parallax_method=”off” custom_padding=”18%|0px|4%|0px|false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”20%||6%|” custom_padding_phone=”20%||10%”][et_pb_row custom_padding=”28px|8%|0|8%|false|true” custom_padding_tablet=”|5%||5%||true” custom_padding_phone=”|3%||3%||true” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”3.18.7″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_post_title author=”off” categories=”off” comments=”off” featured_image=”off” _builder_version=”3.18.7″ title_font=”Roboto||||||||” title_text_color=”#ffffff” title_font_size=”40px” title_font_size_tablet=”30px” title_font_size_phone=”22px” title_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” meta_font=”||||||||” meta_text_color=”#ffffff”][/et_pb_post_title][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Post Body Section” _builder_version=”3.18.7″ background_color=”#ffffff” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||” custom_padding=”60px||60px|0px|true|false”][et_pb_row custom_padding=”30px|8%|30px|8%|true|true” custom_padding_tablet=”|5%||5%||true” custom_padding_phone=”|3%||3%||true” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”3.18.7″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.18.7″ text_font=”||||||||”]

Former Gov. Bill Ritter, who championed the renewable-energy focused New Energy Economy for Colorado during his four-year term, has joined Boulder’s Blackhorn Ventures, a venture capital firm, as a strategy partner.

Blackhorn founders Trevor Zimmerman, Philip O’Connor, and Jack Fuchs believe Governor Ritter’s expertise will be a key asset in helping the company identify investments and partnerships moving forward. We are honored to have Governor Ritter as part of our team. He is a leader in the modernization of our infrastructure and economy, and he recognizes the critical role entrepreneurs play in the advancement of our industries said Blackhorn Co-Founder and Managing Partner Philip O’Connor.

Link to Global News Wire Announcement: link

Link to Denver Business Journal Article: link

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Post Footer” _builder_version=”3.18.7″ background_color=”#000000″ border_style_all=”none” border_width_top=”0.8px” border_color_top=”#ffffff” custom_margin=”||-140px” global_module=”1161″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.18.7″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” border_style_all=”none”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Based in Boulder” _builder_version=”3.18.7″ text_font=”|600|||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” custom_margin=”10px||”]

Based in Boulder CO. Click here to learn why

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_6″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_image src=”https://blackhornvc.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/Twitter-BV-Social-Icon-45-PX.png” url=”https://twitter.com/blackhornvc” url_new_window=”on” align=”center” admin_label=”Twitter Icon” _builder_version=”3.17.6″ custom_margin=”5px||”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_6″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_image src=”https://blackhornvc.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/YouTube-BV-Social-Icon-45-PX.png” url=”https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCH9wQgFr5goz-lf9nsjE0pw” url_new_window=”on” align=”center” admin_label=”Youtube Icon” _builder_version=”3.17.6″ custom_margin=”5px||” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_6″ _builder_version=”3.0.47″ parallax=”off” parallax_method=”on”][et_pb_image src=”https://blackhornvc.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/LinkedIn-BV-Social-Icon-45-PX.png” url=”https://www.linkedin.com/company/blackhorn-ventures/” url_new_window=”on” align=”center” admin_label=”Linkedin icon” _builder_version=”3.17.6″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
